jobDescription: Opportunity: Director of Data Science & Analytics  The BeyondCurious Director of Data Science & Analytics is responsible for orchestrating and delivering large, complex data science solutions for our enterprise clients. Working in tandem with internal multidisciplinary teams, external clients and partners, you will be responsible for delivering research driven, strategic solutions that challenge existing digital boundaries, introduce the latest technologies suitable for true, digital innovation and creating immediate impact and business value for our clients. The role will entail delivering advanced analytics and cognitive type solutions that will create value for our clients and help them gain a competitive advantage. Who is the Director of Data Science & Analytics? The BeyondCurious Director of Data Science & Analytics brings a dual competency of business and technology expertise to develop analytics-based solutions that create value for our wide range of clients including Fortune 500 brands in various industries. Working at the intersection of business and technology, you will help to build holistic solutions for clients across the analytics spectrum, from descriptive, predictive, prescriptive to cognitive, leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning.  You are equipped with deep technical expertise across data discovery and analysis as well as mathematical modeling and coding to drive unique and strategic business insights. You are a well-seasoned strategic leader with the proven ability to effectively manage a successful team while building strong, long lasting relationships with clients.  You have the stamina to lead large and complex engagements to help our clients address their business imperatives. A results-driven, growth-minded individual with an entrepreneurial mindset, you will support the company to further build the practice and our offerings through regular thought leadership creation and best practice development.  You will be a leader, helping to build a rapidly growing company that is working with Fortune 500 companies to accelerate digital transformation of their business models, capabilities, customer experiences, and cultures.
